description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Tinqueux, France. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Champagne Relais & Châteaux Mansion Escape with Three Michelin-Starred Restaurant
hotels.description: Escape to the picturesque scenes of northern France with a luxurious stay at the five-star L'Assiette Champenoise, a boutique Relais & Châteaux property ranked within the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Located in Tinqueux, surrounded by Champagne's rolling vineyards and Reim's heritage sites, the hotel has an impressive three-Michelin-starred restaurant and a collection of suites swept with designer interiors, making it the epitome of French luxe. While away the day in the swimming pool, vine-hop through Champagne, admire Reim's striking Gothic cathedral and pretty boulevards, or spend the day in Paris, a 90-minute drive away. In the evening, soak up the mansion's ambiance with pre-dinner drinks at the chic bar, before indulging in a harmony of exquisite signature dishes curated by French chef, Arnaud Lallement.

seo.title: Hotel a Tinqueux - France Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Tinqueux, France con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
